FAQ

How does GrammFix work?
GrammFix leverages advanced AI technology to analyze and improve your text. When you input your writing, it processes the text using the latest version of ChatGPT, offering grammar corrections, style improvements, translations, and more. You can also interact with specific features like summarizing, adjusting tone, or expanding content, all directly within the browser, making writing tasks faster and easier.

How do I use GrammFix?
Using GrammFix is simple. Install the browser extension, and it will be accessible across any website. Highlight the text you want to improve or write in the input area provided by the extension. Then, select the action you need, such as grammar correction, improving writing, translation, or more. GrammFix will instantly process your request and provide intelligent suggestions to enhance your writing.

Can GrammFix handle multiple languages?
Yes, GrammFix supports a wide range of languages, including right-to-left (RTL) languages like Hebrew and Arabic. It automatically detects the language of your text and provides accurate corrections and adjustments, ensuring a smooth experience regardless of the language you're using.

What happens to my text data? Is it secure?
Your text data is never stored or shared. GrammFix processes all your inputs securely through encrypted connections, ensuring that your writing remains private. We adhere to strict data protection practices, so your data is only used for real-time processing and is not retained on our systems.
